_header: On the Rood I was put for thee
Subjects: paraphrases; Christ, appeal of, to man
_description: A paraphrase of ‘In cruce sum pro te’, etc. — five lines

CamMag13.Transcription:
On the rode I was put for þeþu þat synnyste sease for
                    meSease & I pardone thefyght & stryve & I helpe
                    þeOvyr comme & I crown þe
CamMag13.Note:
Added by a later hand to blank space below 1436.5 (‘If thou wylte lyue…’); preceded in left
                    margin by ‘Take hede for’ and followed in right margin by ‘I
                    ffyloll’.
CamMag13.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the College Library of
                Magdalene College Cambridge.
         Cambridge: at the UP, 1909: 29.
